alert.note: Alert for Northern Grafton; Southern Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 6:22PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Grafton County through 700 PM EDT... At 621 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fairlee, or 19 miles north of Lebanon, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lyme and Orford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
